column3: Mostar residents donate money to beggars because they trust them.

column2: Na Bijelom Brijegu ljeti, kada su otvoreni prozori, ljudi ne čuju buku.
column3: During summer, people of Bijeli Brijeg do not hear noise through open windows.

column2: Na Bijelom Brijegu nema glasnih pijanki do kasno u noć.
column3: There are no loud parties at Bijeli Brijeg in the late hours of the night.

column2: Na Bijelom Brijegu postoji kućni red pa se stanovi u zgradi ne renoviraju u vrijeme poslijepodnevnog odmora.
column3: The apartments at Bijeli Brijeg are not renovated during the afternoon break due to home rules.

column2: Ljudima u Mostaru nije problem požaliti se na nešto, jer im drugi ljudi neće reći „šta ćeš ti“.
column3: People in Mostar have no issue complaining about something since no one will tell them "what are you gonna do." (belittling)

column2: Mladi ljudi rade za strane firme i donose nove ideje u Mostar.
column3: Young people work for foreign companies and bring new ideas to Mostar

column2: Boćalište na Bijelom Brijegu je mjesto druženja penzionera
column3: Bocce at Bijeli Brijeg is a place for retirees to socialize.

column2: UG Stope nade su organizirale druženje za žene
column3: Stope Nade', a citizens' organization, hosted a gathering for women.

column2: SPES Centar organizira druženje.
column3: Socializing is organized by the SPES Center.

column2: SPES Centar organizira vježbanje.
column3: Exercise is organized by the SPES Center.

column2: Kontejneri su postavljeni pored igrališta na Bijelom Brijegu.
column3: The waste bins are placed next to the playground at Bijeli Brijeg.

column2: Pošta na Bijelom Brijegu nije pljačkana.
column3: Bijeli Brijeg's post office was not robbed.

column2: Pošta na Bijelom Brijegu nije zatvorena.
column3: Bijeli Brijeg's post office is not closed.

column2: Ljudi sa Bijelog Brijega ne moraju zvati taksi da bi odvezli svoje smeće do najbližeg kontejnera, jer je predaleko.
column3: Bijeli Brijeg residents don't need to call a taxi to transport their waste because the nearest waste bin is too far away.

column2: Postavljen je videonadzor kod hotel Ero.
column3: Video surveillance has been installed at the Ero Hotel.

column2: Komunalna služba Parkovi frekventnije odvozi otpad sa Bijelog Brijega.
column3: Bijelo Brijeg's waste is removed frequently by the "Parkovi" (The Parks) utility service.

column2: Kontejneri iza stadiona zamijenjeni su novim parkom.
column3: A new park has taken the place of the waste bins behind the stadium.

column2: Na Trimuši je napravljen neki kafić.
column3: A cafe was built at Trimuša.

column2: Čitavo naselje Bijeli Brijeg je osvijetljeno.
column3: The entire settlement of Bijeli Brijeg is illuminated.

column2: Komunalna preduzeća redovno čiste grad.
column3: Utility companies clean the city on a regular basis.

column2: Zakon je isti prema svima, bez obzira koliko je netko "moćan".
column3: No matter how "powerful" someone is, the law applies to them all.

column2: U izbornoj godini se u eteru ne ističu problemi kako bi se ljudi naložili.
column3: There is no discussion on air of concerns during an election year to avoid disagreements.

column2: Političari odstupaju sa svog položaja nakon 4 godine mandata, pa daju drugima priliku da rade.
column3: Politicians quit after four years in government, allowing others to work.

column2: Policija pronalazi lopove koji pljačkaju stanove u naselju ispod Bijelog Brijega.
column3: In the Bijeli Brijeg settlement, police found criminals robbing apartments.

column2: U Mostaru postoji dovoljan broj policajaca.
column3: There are enough police officers in Mostar.

column2: Ljudi s Bijelog Brijega imaju komunikaciju sa Gradom putem povjerenika MZ.
column3: Through the local Mjesna zajednica is how residents of Bijeli Brijeg connect with the city.

column2: Kreira se poduzetnička klima, tako što strani donatori daju novac građanima da rade projekte.
column3: Foreign donors give money to residents to fund initiatives, which provides a variety of jobs.

column2: Ljudi zaposleni u privatnom sektoru su plaćeni bolje nego sada.
column3: People in the private sector were paid more than they are now.

column2: Djevojka koja studira kemijsko inženjerstvo u Mostaru nema straha da se neće moći zaposliti.
column3: A chemical engineering student in Mostar is unconcerned about not being able to find work.

column2: Navijači koji se tuku se adekvatno sankcioniraju.
column3: Fans that engage in fights are properly sanctioned.

column2: Na stadionu pod Bijelom Brijegu nema nereda, ni prije ni za vrijeme utakmice.
column3: There are no riots at the Bijeli Brijeg stadium, either before or during the match

column2: U Mostaru postoji kola trčanja Sanus. (NVO)
column3: There is a Sanus Motus Centar in Mostar (NGO)

column2: Komentari na medijskim portalima nakon utakmica ne pokazuju nacionalizam.
column3: After the matches, comments on media portals do not reflect nationalism.

column2: U medijima se stalno ne pojavljuju priče o ratu.
column3: Stories concerning the war do not always appear in the media.

column2: Dijete može otići samo pješke u školu na Bijelom Brijegu, bez straha kako će se vratiti kući.
column3: A child can only walk to school at Bijeli Brijeg, without being afraid to return home alone.

column2: Grad Mostar organizira lijep doček Nove godine na otvorenom u Mostaru.
column3: The city of Mostar is hosting a festive New Year's Eve celebration in the open air.

column2: U Pavarotiju nema politike.
column3: There is no politics in the Pavarotti Music Center

column2: U Pavarotiju je glazba zajednički nazivnik.
column3: Music is a common denominator at the Pavarotti Music Center.

column2: Ljudi u Mostaru znaju funkcionirati u grupi.
column3: People in Mostar know how to function in a group.

column2: Oko Mrtvare noću ljeti nema starijih muškaraca (40+), koji ostavljaju na ogradi kesice sa smećem.
column3: During summer, there are no older men (40+) surrounding Mrtvara who leave waste bags on the fence.

column2: Oko Mrtvare ljeti noću nema starijih muškaraca (40+), koji smetaju drugim ljudima do 2-3 sata ujutro.
column3: During summer, there are no older men (40+) surrounding Mrtvara who bother other people until 2-3 a.m.
